pre_install: if((Test-Path("$env:TEMP\__scoop__preserved"))) { Write-Output "[pre_install] Removing temporary preserved folder"; Remove-Item "$env:TEMP\__scoop__preserved" -Recurse -Force }
Write-Output "[pre_install] Creating temporary preserved folder"; New-Item "$env:TEMP\__scoop__preserved" -type directory | Out-Null
post_install: Write-Output "[post_install] Overwriting from original files"; Copy-Item "$env:TEMP\__scoop__preserved\*" "$dir" -Recurse -Force
Write-Output "[post_install] Removing temporary preserved folder"; Remove-Item "$env:TEMP\__scoop__preserved" -Recurse -Force
